html_job_description:
Job Description
 We are looking for a big data engineer to be a part of our expanding team of data scientists. The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of hands on experience in technologies involving Hadoop concepts and will be responsible for building, maintaining and optimizing our data pipeline architecture. The data engineer should be able to cross collaborate among teams to bridge the data and data summary requirements in a time constraint environment, so that a seamless delivery of data is ensured to support the ongoing projects. Experience required in performing root cause analysis on various data stacks to answer specific business queries and identify opportunities of operational improvement. A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.
 The candidate should have good communication/verbal skills to handle outward communications directly in a client facing role. Capability of writing, debugging and compiling codes on multiple machine learning platforms. Quick learner and adaptable to new technologies in the fast changing industry.
 Key Responsibilities
 Query different data stacks to summarize and generate periodical reports using HIVE, PIG
 Automation of processes using Python/Scala
 Management of mailbox, on time and accurate response to clients
 Technical monitoring of data pipeline
 SLA management and status update
 Creation/Enhancement of dashboards using Tableau or any other software
 Ability to quickly grasp business questions from stakeholders and providing clarifications with data support
 Checking sanity of files, reporting data quality issues
 Handling new registration requests, guiding clients with templates, naming conventions and documentations
 Requirements & Skill Sets
 Mandatory: HIVE, Hadoop concepts, Python, M.S.Excel
 Good to have: Scala, Spark, Tableau, Power BI, DB2, SQL
 Any bachelors or masters degree in engineering, mathematics or related field. Minimum experience of 3 years with the above skill sets.
 ,

Job description:<br><br>The Data Scientist atDraup will be responsible for analysing huge volume of unstructured text data and deriving insights from the same. You will be working heavily on NLP techniques such as POS Tagging , Named Entity Recognition , Pattern Matching , Text Clustering and Classification. You will also be responsible of doing EDA to understand the nature of the data and do proper cleaning and pre- processing of data before modelling.<br><br>Experience:<br><br>Bachelor/ Master degree in CSE/  IT/  ECE preferably from a top tier engineering college like IIT/ NIT/ BITS etc.<br><br>GPA of 8.0 or above<br><br>Experience of 1- 3 Years working with Machine Learning algorithmsSkills and Qualifications:<br><br>At least 1 year industry experience in a Full- Time Data Science/ ML role.<br><br>Excellent proficiency in Python.<br><br>Hands- on knowledge of using Python libraries like Pandas , NumPy , SciPy , Scikit- Learn.<br><br>At least 1 year experience of working with textual data.<br><br>Knowledge of different classification and clustering techniques.<br><br>Familiarity with Deep Learning algorithms.<br><br>Knowledge of TensorFlow/ Keras framework.<br><br>Understanding of distributed text representations like Word2Vec , GLOVE etc.<br><br>Experience in Spark or other equivalent frameworks.Application form:

<ul> <li> Deep technical understanding of all things data</li> <li> Ability to get hands on and not just talk and draw pictures</li> <li> Ability to proactively engage in complex sales pursuits with <p> If you are passionate about business and technology and have the chops to make a difference, we'd love to hear from you. </p> <p> Bachelor's or Masters Degree in Computer Science, Electrical origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.</p> <div> <br> </div> <p><b>Required Candidate profile</b></p>As a member of Neudesics Solutions Delivery Group, the GCP Senior Data Engineer will work as part of a team to jointly pursue sales with Google and work with internal teams to successfully transition sales efforts to delivery teams.<br><br>In this role, you will focus on leveraging your technical background in data management and visualization and your ability to build solutions that drive a predictive and prescriptive decision-making process. While your day-to-day activities are not exclusively writing code you must possess the ability to build the solutions you sell. You will leverage your practical experience in developing complex data solutions that map to business needs by leveraging a team of highly skilled Google technologists from around the world to ensure flawless service delivery.<br><br><br>To be successful, you must exhibit strong leadership qualities necessary for building trust with clients and our technologists. You will partner with solution architects to drive client success by providing practical guidance based on your years of experience in data management and visualization solutions. You will partner with a diverse sales unit to professionally represent Neudesic experience and ability to drive business results. In addition, you will assist in creating sales assets that clearly communicate our value proposition to technical decision makers.<br><br><p><b>Perks and Benefits </b></p>"based on your Expertise"

<B> Job Description </B> <BR> <P> <STRONG> Position Summary </STRONG> </P> <P> The Director of Data Science is a lead Data Engineer role in the Central Europe, Middle East and Africa region (CEMEA) based out of Bangalore. We are looking for an expert with deep expertise in data warehousing and can build large-scale data processing systems by using the latest database technologies. This is a Pan-regional position and plays a critical role in enabling the data platforms through which Data Scientists, Analysts, and BI Users drive solutions for our Visa clients. Also, the role provides a bridge between our local end-users and our Visa Technology colleagues in San Francisco, influencing the development of our global data platforms whilst provisioning local tools and technologies as required. The Data Engineer takes responsibility for building and running data pipelines, designing our local data warehouse and data frameworks, and catering for different data presentation techniques. </P> <P> <BR> <STRONG> Principal Responsibilities </STRONG> </P> <UL> <LI> Design local modifications to our global data architecture, including new tools and technologies where necessary to meet regional use-cases </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Provide direction to the development of bespoke, client-specific data sandboxes </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture(s), based on our Global Technology Stack </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements to provide greater scalability to our existing client solutions </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Develop custom-built packages and glue code to support the needs of Data Scientists across the region </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Work with broader business stakeholders to assist clients and consultants with their data and infrastructure needs </LI> </UL> <P> <STRONG> <EM> <U> Design architecture </U> </EM> </STRONG> </P> <P> Work with Visa s Global Technology team to leverage our existing architecture to best effect, whilst identifying new and complementary tools and technology that will better enable our local solutions; serve as key contact and subject matter expert in working with the Visa Technology functions around the world (both global and regional) </P> <P> <EM> <STRONG> <U> Design sandbox architecture </U> </STRONG> </EM> </P> <P> Provide SME support to the design and build of client-specific data sandboxes that may leverage the advantages of cloud technologies whilst ensuring strong security and privacy controls </P> <P> <STRONG> <EM> <U> Build data pipelines </U> </EM> </STRONG> </P> <P> Build and operate stable, scalable data pipelines that cleanse, structure and integrate data sets into accessible formats for Data Scientists and other end-users, ensuring that testing and monitoring functions are performed appropriately </P> <P> <EM> <STRONG> <U> Supporting external clients data architecture </U> </STRONG> </EM> </P> <P> Provide Data Engineering expertise support to Visa s select top-level clients, advising on how to implement, acquire, and improve their existing and planned data solutions. Such solutions can involve complex data integration from various sources (from an internal data warehouse, applicable VisaNet transaction data or third-party data) within the constraints of the client s legal and regulatory limitations.  </P> <P> <STRONG> <EM> <U> Implement for scale </U> </EM> </STRONG> </P> <P> Co-create and contribute to the design and deployment of scalable, high volume and real-time data solutions (dashboards, data feeds, and algorithms) running in production systems to ensure optimal functioning and sustainability of solutions built </P> <P> <EM> <STRONG> <U> Support Data Scientists </U> </STRONG> </EM> </P> <P> Provide advisory and hands-on support to Data Scientists by providing quality assurance to teams writing poor-quality data queries on our queue, and developing custom-built packages and glue code that take algorithms into production </P> <P> <STRONG> <EM> <U> Serve as subject matter expert </U> </EM> </STRONG> </P> <P> Provide support and advisory assistance to business stakeholders (client relationship managers, consultants, and other internal stakeholders) in framing potential use-cases, client engagements, and internal initiatives </P> <BR> <BR> <B> Qualifications </B> <BR> <P> <STRONG> Professional Experience </STRONG> </P> <UL> <LI> 8 - 10 years' application development and support experience. </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Deep knowledge of distributed data architecture, commonly-used BI tools, and approaches/packages deployed for machine learning build </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Experience creating production software/systems and a proven track record of identifying and resolving performance bottlenecks for production systems. </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Experience in machine learning algorithm design, feature engineering, validation, prediction, recommendation, and measurement.  </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Experience with complex, high volume, multi-dimensional data, as well as machine learning models based on unstructured, structured, and streaming datasets. </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Good understanding of the Payments and Banking Industry including aspects such as consumer credit, consumer debit, prepaid, small business, commercial, co-branded and merchant </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Experience planning, organising, and managing multiple large projects with diverse cross-functional teams </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Demonstrated ability to incorporate new techniques to solve business problems </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Demonstrated resource planning and delivery skills </LI> </UL> <P> <STRONG> Technical Expertise </STRONG> </P> <UL> <LI> Post Graduate Degree in Information Technology </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Qualification in Computer Science or Engineering ideal.  </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Certification in Hadoop (Cloudera or Hortonworks) and Apache Spark.  </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Working knowledge of Hadoop ecosystem and associated technologies, e.g., Apache Spark, MLlib, GraphX, iPython, sci-kit, and Pandas </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Advanced experience in writing and optimizing efficient SQL queries and Python scripts; Scala and C++ experience is ideal </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Deliver results within committed scope, timeline and budget </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Very strong people/project management skills and experience </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Ability to travel within CEMEA on short notice </LI> </UL> <P> <STRONG> Business Experience </STRONG> </P> <UL> <LI> Results-oriented with strong problem solving skills and demonstrated intellectual and analytical rigor </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Good business acumen with a track record in solving business problems through data-driven quantitative methodologies. Experience in payment, retail banking, or retail merchant industries is preferred </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Team oriented, collaborative, diplomatic, and flexible style </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Very detailed oriented, is expected to ensure highest level of quality/rigor in reports and data analysis </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Proven skills in translating analytics output to actionable recommendations and delivery </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Experience in presenting ideas and analysis to stakeholders whilst tailoring data-driven results to various audience levels </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Exhibits intellectual curiosity and a desire for continuous learning </LI> </UL> <P> <STRONG> Leadership Competencies </STRONG> </P> <UL> <LI> Exhibits intellectual curiosity and a desire for continuous learning </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Demonstrates integrity, maturity and a constructive approach to business challenges </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Role model for the organization and implementing core Visa Values </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Respect for the Individuals at all levels in the workplace </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Strive for Excellence and extraordinary results </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Use sound insights and judgments to make informed decisions in line with business strategy and needs </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Leadership skills include an ability to allocate tasks and resources across multiple lines of businesses and geographies. Leadership extends to ability to influence senior management within and outside Analytics groups </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Ability to successfully persuade/influence internal stakeholders for building best-in-class solutions </LI> </UL> <UL> <LI> Change management leadership </LI> </UL>

We are looking for a Big Data Engineer who will work on collecting,  storing,  processing,  and analyzing large sets of data from different data sources. The primary focus will be on choosing optimal solutions to use for these purposes,  then implementing and improving on them. If you do not like to take on new challenges every day,  then this is definitely not for you.<br><br>Responsibilities:  <br><br>1. Work directly with a seasoned founding team to conceptualize and create the final product<br><br>2. Opportunity to create an architecture,  implement,  maintain,  and monitor a generic ETL pipeline that can be used across different types of data sources<br><br>3. Working with our research team to validate the defined data models for a variety of data sources and implementing them by integrating any Big Data tools and frameworks required to provide requested capabilities<br><br>4. Monitoring performance,  optimizing the architecture,  and advising any necessary infrastructure changes to suit your application needs<br><br>5. Creating a platform on top of stored data sources using a distributed processing environment like Spark,  for the users to perform any kind of ad- hoc queries with complete abstraction from the internal data points<br><br>6. Defining data retention policies<br><br>7. Opportunity to collaborate and work with the team to create Artificial Intelligence Application with the use of all the processed data<br><br>Skills:  <br><br>1. Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science or related streams;   equivalent professional experience may be substituted for formal education<br><br>2. Proficient understanding of distributed computing principles<br><br>3. Proficiency in Apache Spark is a MUST<br><br>4. Experience with integration of data from multiple data sources<br><br>5. Experience working with NoSQL databases like Cassandra,  MongoDB and SQL databases like MySQL<br><br>6. Good working knowledge of MapReduce,  HDFS<br><br>7. Experience with building stream- processing systems,  using solutions such as Storm or Spark- Streaming <br><br>8. Good knowledge of Big Data querying tools such as Pig,  Hive,  and Impala<br><br>9. At Karza technologies, we take pride in building one of the most comprehensive digital due-diligence platform by profiling millions of entities and trillions of associations amongst them using data collated from more than 700 publicly available government sources. Collated data is standardized using Karza Technologies- declarative in-house extract, transform, load (ETL) framework, which leverages container orchestration services to dynamically scale Kafka based consumers. Attributed to the wide variety of data driven use cases what Karza solves, it is not uncommon for us to look at the same set of data points from varying aspects by ensembling a combination of data stores tuned for workloads like batch processing, network analysis, time series analysis, fuzzy searches and predictive analytics. <BR> <BR> Some other highlights include : <BR> - Recognized as Top25 startups to work with, 2019 by LinkedIn <BR> - Only startup in Yes Bank Global Fintech Accelerator (Autumn Cohort) 2018 to sign a contract at the end of the program <BR> - One of eight startups shortlisted from over 200, in Citi India FinTech Challenge 2018 by Citibank - Awarded second runner-up in the first batch of Viacom18's Startup Engagement Programme VStEP, in addition to signing a contract at the end of the program <BR> - Winner of FinTech Spot Pitches at Fintegrate Zone 2018 held at Bombay Stock Exchange <BR> - Winner of FinShare 2018 challenge held by ShareKhan <BR> <BR> Must have skills : <BR> - Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, concurrency, distributed processing and data parallelism. <BR> - Good conceptual understanding of a subset of NoSQL data stores like search, graph, wide-column, key/value and document databases. <BR> - Thorough understanding of at least one of the NoSQL data stores- Preferable, if it includes Cassandra, Elastic Search, JanusGraph, Spark or Kafka. <BR> - Should be proficient in at least one of the general-purpose programming languages like Python, Java, Scala, etc. <BR> <BR> Highly desired but not mandatory : <BR> - Containers and orchestration services . <BR> - Experience of building auto-scalable event driven data pipelines. <BR> - Deep interest in Graph algorithms and mathematics. <BR> - Should be comfortable in going through open source code and reading research papers.

job_description:
Experience: 5 - 8 years
Keywords / Skills : Big Data Engineer, Python,  Java,  C, C++,  Scala, Hadoop,  HBase,  Yarn,  Presto,  Kafka,  Apache Spark

Job Description

As a Big Data Engineer, you will be responsible for working on applications and services that handle all types of transactions. You will work in a fast-paced environment where continuous innovation and experimentation are a given. You will master both established and cutting-edge technologies like Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Presto, Oracle, Casandra, Storm, Kafka, Druid, MongoDB, CouchBase, among others to build data validation framework.
Develop the vision for an ever-evolving Data validation improvement strategy that not only satisfies current needs but can be easily adapted to future needs as new sources of data input and requirements for data output are identified
Designing, testing, deploying and documenting data validation procedures and their outputs
Utilize data validation tooling to profile the project source data, define or confirm the definition of the metadata, cleanse and accurately check the project data, check for duplicate or redundant records, and provide information on how to proceed with backend ETL Processes
Partner with data stewards to provide summary results of data validation analysis, which will be used to make decisions regarding how to measure business rules and quality of the data
Develop methods to cleanse, manipulate and analyze large datasets, structured and unstructured data using Hadoop platform
Expert on data architecture, data models, data governance and data flow diagrams
Collaborating with peers and seniors both within their team and across the organization
Experience with Cloud, industry-specific and data privacy, protection regulatory compliance requirements (GDPR, CCPA, PCI, FFIEC etc.)
Thorough knowledge of agile software delivery models (Kanban, Scrum, Less, SAFe, etc.)
Design, develop, test, and debug large scale complex platform using big data technologies
Develop tools and automation for the effective management and operation of Big Data platform
Collaborate with architects, engineers, and business on product design and feature
Exhibit a strong backbone and challenge the status quo when needed
Demonstrate a high level of curiosity and keep abreast of the latest technologies
Attention details are a must-have skill, show pride of ownership and strive for excellence in everything they do
Job Requirements:
5 + years of software development experience
BS in Computer Science or related degree required. MS preferred
A mastery of how data validation is measured, including understanding of completeness, uniqueness, validity, accuracy, integrity, timeliness
Experience programming languages like Python, Java, C/C++, Scala or Go
Expert in Big Data Technologies such as Hadoop, HBase, Yarn, Presto, Kafka, Apache Spark
Experience in database/storage technologies, systems like DB2, Oracle, Cassandra, CouchBase, Mainframe
Competent in design/implementation for security, quality, reliability, availability, scalability, and performance
Skilled in software engineering tools and best practices

Job Description

Job Title: 	Big Data Engineer
Experience:	6-10 years
Job Description:
• Total experience of 6 to 12 years with minimum 5 years of hands-on high-performance development experience in Big data Platforms.
• Excellent development and debugging skills using Java / Scala.
• Knowledge / Contribution to Apache opensource projects such as Kafka, Zookeeper, Hadoop, Hive, Hbase, Spark etc is a big plus.
• Prior experience being part of a team that delivered early versions of a product in a successful startup is a plus
• Minimum Bachelors or Master’s degree in computer science (or equivalent)
Job Location: 	Pune
 Great Software Laboratory Private Limited

 IT

<P> <P> Seeking experienced BigData/ NOSQL developers to join our agile team and be part of creating enterprise solutions at scale. </P> <P> <BR> </P> <P> The developer will work with a team of database & storage developers focused on defining road maps, standards, use cases and optimizing the performance of system. </P> <P> <BR> </P> <P> The ideal incumbent will have fair knowledge of relational databases and deep understanding of BigData/NOSQL as well as database fundamentals including data storage, data modelling and data access patterns. <BR> <BR> Responsibilities : <BR> <BR> - Research, evaluate and recommend BigData/ NOSQL solutions (existing & emerging) and best use cases for them. <BR> <BR> - Should have implementation knowledge of Hadoop Ecosystem / BigData Solutions <BR> <BR> - Programming languages: Python, Scala. <BR> <BR> - Preferred Knowledge on Hive, Spark, Kafka & JSON. <BR> <BR> - Working knowledge with various databases: DB2, Oracle, Teradata <BR> <BR> - Conduct system performance evaluations. <BR> <BR> - Create and manage PySpark jobs for data transformation and aggregation along with query tuning and performance optimization. <BR> <BR> - Design data processing pipelines and Experience in implementation of data ingestion pipeline for Batch and Streaming data. <BR> <BR> - Assist Development Teams in designing, modeling and validating BigData/ NOSQL solutions for their applications. <BR> <BR> - Able to thrive in an Onshore/Offshore working model. <BR> <BR> - Client handling skills and able to map the business requirements with the technology stack. <BR> <BR> Should have knowledge of any or the below NOSQL Databases : <BR> <BR> - Mongo DB <BR> <BR> - Cassandra <BR> <BR> - HBase <BR> <BR> - Cosmos DB <BR> <BR> - Dynamo DB.</P>

What You ll Do<br><br>Specialize in data integration (from 100+ source systems in batch ,  near real-time ,  and real-time) . <br><br>Specialize in data governance and security of data assets . <br><br>Participate in collaborative software design and development of the new Enterprise Data Lake on Hortonworks HDP and HDF distributions . <br><br>Build data lake on Azure cloud . <br><br>Manage own learning and contribute to technical skill building of the team . <br><br>Embrace the engineering mindset and systems thinking . <br><br>Gain deep technical expertise in the data movement patterns ,  practices and tools . Required Qualifications<br><br>Bachelor s degree or higher in Computer Science ,  a related field ,  or equivalent experience . <br><br>Expertise with distributed computing and big data architectures . <br><br>Passion for software engineering and craftsman-like coding prowess . <br><br>Proven experience in developing Big Data Pipelines in a Hadoop Ecosystem using Kafka ,  Hive ,  Hive w / Tez ,  HDFS ,  HBase ,  and Spark on Yarn (Hortonworks HDP preferred) . <br><br>Proved experience in attribute based security systems .  Atlas / Ranger ,  Colibra ,  etc . <br><br>Development experience with at least one NoSQL database .  HBase or Cassandra preferred . <br><br>Capable of developing in Java and Scala with good understanding of functional programming ,  SOLID principles and ,  concurrency models and modularization . <br><br>DevOps :  Appreciates the CI and CD model and always builds to ease consumption and monitoring of the system .  Experience with Maven (or Gradle or SBT) and Git preferred . <br><br>Experience in Agile development including Scrum and other lean techniques . <br><br>Experience with workload orchestration and automation tools .  Oozie etc . <br><br>Experience with performance optimization for Spark Hive SQL Workloads . <br><br>Believe in Build ,  Ship ,  Monitor Philosophy . <br><br>Personal qualities such as creativity ,  tenacity ,  curiosity ,  and passion for deep technical excellence . job_description: What You ll Do<br><br>Specialize in data integration (from 100+ source systems in batch ,  near real-time ,  and real-time) . <br><br>Specialize in data governance and security of data assets . <br><br>Participate in collaborative software design and development of the new Enterprise Data Lake on Hortonworks HDP and HDF distributions . <br><br>Build data lake on Azure cloud . <br><br>Manage own learning and contribute to technical skill building of the team . <br><br>Embrace the engineering mindset and systems thinking . <br><br>Gain deep technical expertise in the data movement patterns ,  practices and tools . Required Qualifications<br><br>Bachelor s degree or higher in Computer Science ,  a related field ,  or equivalent experience . <br><br>Expertise with distributed computing and big data architectures . <br><br>Passion for software engineering and craftsman-like coding prowess . <br><br>Proven experience in developing Big Data Pipelines in a Hadoop Ecosystem using Kafka ,  Hive ,  Hive w / Tez ,  HDFS ,  HBase ,  and Spark on Yarn (Hortonworks HDP preferred) . <br><br>Proved experience in attribute based security systems .  Atlas / Ranger ,  Colibra ,  etc . <br><br>Development experience with at least one NoSQL database .  HBase or Cassandra preferred . <br><br>Capable of developing in Java and Scala with good understanding of functional programming ,  SOLID principles and ,  concurrency models and modularization . <br><br>DevOps :  Appreciates the CI and CD model and always builds to ease consumption and monitoring of the system .  Experience with Maven (or Gradle or SBT) and Git preferred . <br><br>Experience in Agile development including Scrum and other lean techniques . <br><br>Experience with workload orchestration and automation tools .  Oozie etc . <br><br>Experience with performance optimization for Spark Hive SQL Workloads . <br><br>Believe in Build ,  Ship ,  Monitor Philosophy . <br><br>Personal qualities such as creativity ,  tenacity ,  curiosity ,  and passion for deep technical excellence . Desired Qualifications<br><br>Experience with Big Data migrations / transformations programs in the Data Warehousing and / or Business Intelligence areas . <br><br>Good grounding in NoSQL data stores such as Cassandra ,  Neo4j etc . <br><br>Strong knowledge on computer algorithms . <br><br>Experience in building self-contained applications using Docker ,  Vagrant .  Chef . <br><br>Experience with schema changes in a CI and CD . EEO StatementIntegrated into our shared values is NCR s commitment to diversity . Job Description

Description:

  • Data Migration in large and complex environments 
  • Good understanding of Databases, Servers, Operating Systems and Performance Engineering. 
  • Strong Experience in producing various Technical Documentations 
  • The Data Warehouse Architect position is a technical, hands-on role. You will undertake Enterprise Data Warehousing and Data integration initiatives within the Data Services Group. 
  • Good experience in Data Modeling and Data Architecture.
  • Strong understanding of DW concepts / Design and implementation.
  • Understanding of conceptual, logical, and physical data modeling.
  • Good understanding of service oriented architectures , application frameworks and system integration methods. 
  • Experience of full lifecycle development projects. 
  • Familiarity with emerging technologies and software development best practices, particularly related to Enterprise Data Development.
  • Development experience with Oracle database technologies, strong PL / SQL skills.
  • Building of Operational Data Stores ( ODS ), Data Marts, Enterprise Data Business and Technical Metadata Management. 
  • Data Analysis and Data Model Development ( i.e. logical and physical models )
  • Working knowledge of Data Quality Management practices using commercially available tools.
  • Familiarity with Data Governance Concepts and Processes.
  • Enterprise Data Integration experience in leading EAI / ETL tools and OLAP tools.
  • Familiarity with Master Data Management concepts.

html_job_description:
Senior Data Warehousing Business Analyst in Mumbai at CIRCOR Career Site    Job Description 
 ORGANIZATIONAL STRUCTURE 


 BUSINESS: Circor Energy 


 LOCATION: India 


 DIRECT REPORTING: Sr. Supply Chain Manager USA 


 FUNCTIONAL REPORTING: Sr Continuous Improvement Manager 


 Position Summary 


 This role is critical for the development, deployment, and analysis of KPI data across a variety of platforms including the CSA data warehouse and local ERP systems. The position directly supports all levels of management, providing input used to develop business strategies and tactical actions. 


 Principle Activities 




    

  •  Work with CSA development team to incorporate new sites into the data warehouse. Actions include testingvalidation and troubleshooting of developmental reports, final release to production, and research of user - reported data issues. 
    • 

  •  Maintenance of non - automated attributes within the data warehouse. 
    • 

  •  Activities associated with the automation of attributes which are currently maintained manually. 
    • 

  •  Training of users in the use of the MicroStrategy BI tool. 
    • 

  •  Assembly and distribution of custom month - end reporting. 
    • 

  •  Analysis of standardized reporting to reveal important trends and statistics, recommending actions for improvement across procurement, supplier performance, inventory, savings, and sales & margin. 
    • 

  •  Support of local BUs and GCMs with ad hoc requests and analysis. 
    • 

  •  Development of new reporting tools to meet changing business needs. 
    • 

  •  Assembly of data in support of monthly EXCO meetings. 
    • 

  •  Shared responsibility for maintenance of the Supply Chain SharePoint site. 
    • 

  •  Supporting activity for maintenance of monthly COS KPIs. 
    • 

    •   Job Requirements 
       Primary Attributes Required 
      

      

        

      •  Excel power user, able to develop advance analytics using a wide variety of functions. 
        • 

      •  Familiarity with the concept of relational databases and reporting (data warehousing and business intelligence tools). 
        • 

      •  Excellent communication skills. Successful candidate will be handling complex explanations with global locations. 
        • 

      •  Demonstrated ability for innovative problem solving. 
        • 

      •  Ability to work with minimal supervision, expanding existing skills and acquiring new skills as needed. 
        • 

      •  Ability to travel internationally (5 - 10%). 
        • 

        

      

    • 

 ,

Job Description

Description:

  • Data Migration in large and complex environments 
  • Good understanding of Databases, Servers, Operating Systems and Performance Engineering. 
  • Strong Experience in producing various Technical Documentations 
  • The Data Warehouse Architect position is a technical, hands-on role. You will undertake Enterprise Data Warehousing and Data integration initiatives within the Data Services Group. 
  • Good experience in Data Modeling and Data Architecture.
  • Strong understanding of DW concepts / Design and implementation.
  • Understanding of conceptual, logical, and physical data modeling.
  • Good understanding of service oriented architectures , application frameworks and system integration methods. 
  • Experience of full lifecycle development projects. 
  • Familiarity with emerging technologies and software development best practices, particularly related to Enterprise Data Development.
  • Development experience with Oracle database technologies, strong PL / SQL skills.
  • Building of Operational Data Stores ( ODS ), Data Marts, Enterprise Data Business and Technical Metadata Management. 
  • Data Analysis and Data Model Development ( i.e. logical and physical models )
  • Working knowledge of Data Quality Management practices using commercially available tools.
  • Familiarity with Data Governance Concepts and Processes.
  • Enterprise Data Integration experience in leading EAI / ETL tools and OLAP tools.
  • Familiarity with Master Data Management concepts.

job_description: Cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP) Architect (8-10 years)

<p> <strong> Responsibilities:</strong> </p> <ul> <li> Drive cloud deployment architecture and DevOps process across the engineering organization an establish new DevOps practices</li> <li> Analyze configuration, re-hosting, and migration of existing software applications and components to cloud environments</li> <li> Perform end-to-end migration of existing systems to cloud environments</li> <li> Provide technical leadership for cloud based applications and train junior DevOps & Cloud engineers to build a high performing team</li> <li> Create requirements and procedures for implementing routine maintenance, incident response, CI/CD pipeline for all production applications</li> <li> Design, develop and implement automation and monitoring for different systems and infrastructure</li> <li> Taking ownership of end-to-end solutions provided by teams across the organization while communicating effectively to foster innovations adoption.</li> <li> Build, deploy, maintain and manage highly available production infrastructure </li> <li> Troubleshoot issues on live environment<br/> </li> </ul> <p><b>Perks and Benefits </b></p>5 day work week Flexible work hours Option to 'work from home'

<P> <P> <P> We have an opportunity for an Architect - Cloud with one of our client for Bangalore, Gurgaon location. <BR> <BR> Primary Responsibilities : <BR> <BR> - Strategizing, designing and implementing a highly efficient solution on Amazon Web Services, Azure or GCP for security, resilience, performant, networking, availability, Blue-green deployments in the context of business application. (By leveraging CI best practices and tooling of Azure, AWS or Google) <BR> <BR> - Writing infrastructure code for public or private clouds and implement modern cloud Integration architecture using : <BR> <BR> <P> <P> a) Configuration Management (Chef, Puppet or Ansible ) <BR> <BR> b) SCM (TFS or GIT) <BR> <BR> c) CI tools (Jenkins or Bamboo) <BR> <BR> d) Azure Resource Manager, Cloud formation or Google Cloud Deployment Manager <BR> <BR> e) Scripting language: Python, Bash and Shell <BR> <BR> - Container services like ECS, ACS, GCE or Kubernetes <BR> <BR> - Security Hardening of cloud infrastructure applicationweb server against knownunknown vulnerabilities. <BR> <BR> - Understands compliance, safe harbor and law of land <BR> <BR> - Designing and implementing software engineering processes, improve efficiency <BR> <BR> - Implementing shift left strategy <BR> <BR> - Designing and setting up automated backup and restoration of applicationweb serversdatabasesdatalakes to object storage like S3 <BR> <BR> - Architecting and implementing end to end monitoring solution in cloud (Nagios, Zabbix, AppD, CWatchetc) including billing <BR> <BR> Education : Full-time Bachelor's, Master's degree(Science or Engineering preferred) .</P>

<P> <P> <P> We have an opportunity for an Architect - Cloud with one of our client for Bangalore, Gurgaon location. <BR> <BR> Primary Responsibilities : <BR> <BR> - Strategizing, designing and implementing a highly efficient solution on Amazon Web Services, Azure or GCP for security, resilience, performant, networking, availability, Blue-green deployments in the context of business application. (By leveraging CI best practices and tooling of Azure, AWS or Google) <BR> <BR> - Writing infrastructure code for public or private clouds and implement modern cloud Integration architecture using : <BR> <BR> <P> <P> a) Configuration Management (Chef, Puppet or Ansible ) <BR> <BR> b) SCM (TFS or GIT) <BR> <BR> c) CI tools (Jenkins or Bamboo) <BR> <BR> d) Azure Resource Manager, Cloud formation or Google Cloud Deployment Manager <BR> <BR> e) Scripting language: Python, Bash and Shell <BR> <BR> - Container services like ECS, ACS, GCE or Kubernetes <BR> <BR> - Security Hardening of cloud infrastructure applicationweb server against knownunknown vulnerabilities. <BR> <BR> - Understands compliance, safe harbor and law of land <BR> <BR> - Designing and implementing software engineering processes, improve efficiency <BR> <BR> - Implementing shift left strategy <BR> <BR> - Designing and setting up automated backup and restoration of applicationweb serversdatabasesdatalakes to object storage like S3 <BR> <BR> - Architecting and implementing end to end monitoring solution in cloud (Nagios, Zabbix, AppD, CWatchetc) including billing <BR> <BR> Education : Full-time Bachelor's, Master's degree(Science or Engineering preferred) .</P>

<p> <strong> Responsibilities:</strong> </p> <ul> <li> Drive cloud deployment architecture and DevOps process across the engineering organization an establish new DevOps practices</li> <li> Analyze configuration, re-hosting, and migration of existing software applications and components to cloud environments</li> <li> Perform end-to-end migration of existing systems to cloud environments</li> <li> Provide technical leadership for cloud based applications and train junior DevOps & Cloud engineers to build a high performing team</li> <li> Create requirements and procedures for implementing routine maintenance, incident response, CI/CD pipeline for all production applications</li> <li> Design, develop and implement automation and monitoring for different systems and infrastructure</li> <li> Taking ownership of end-to-end solutions provided by teams across the organization while communicating effectively to foster innovations adoption.</li> <li> Build, deploy, maintain and manage highly available production infrastructure </li> <li> Troubleshoot issues on live environment<br/> </li> </ul> <p><b>Perks and Benefits </b></p>5 day work week Flexible work hours Option to 'work from home'

<P> <BR> Responsibilities</P> <P> *Create a well-informed cloud strategy and manage the adaption process.</P> <P> *Create Methodologies and Cloud migration process</P> <P> *Regularly evaluate cloud applications, hardware, and software</P> <P>  *Develop and organize cloud systems.</P> <P> *Work closely with IT security to create cloud privacy policies</P> <P> .*Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner.</P> <P> *Offer guidance in infrastructure movement techniques including bulk application transfers into the cloud.Competencies</P> <P> *Ability to create Cloud migration methodologies</P> <P> *Ability to ideate accelerators and frameworks</P> <P> *Positive attitude and a strong commitment to delivering quality work.</P> <P> *Effective communication skills (written and verbal) to properly articulate complicated cloud reports to management and other IT development partners.Experience</P> <P> *Hands on experience in either one of Cloud AWS/AZURE/Google</P> <P> *Have good understanding on the cloud trends and cross cloud architecture</P> <P>  *Excellent knowledge of cloud computing technologies and current computing trends.Preferred backgroundBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or relevant field.Cloud architect certification is must<BR> </P>

<p> <strong> <u> About Fractal</u> </strong> <br> What makes Fractal a GREAT fit for you? When you join Fractal, you'll be part of a fast-growing team that helps our clients leverage AI together with the power of behavioural sciences to make better decisions. We're a strategic analytics partner to most admired fortune 500 companies globally, we help them power every human decision in the enterprise by bringing analytics, AI and behavioural science to the decision.<br> <br> </p> <p> Our people enjoy a collaborative work environment, exceptional training and career development - as well as unlimited growth opportunities. We have a Glassdoor rating of 4 / 5 and achieve customer NPS of 9/ 10. If you like working with a curious, supportive, high-performing team, Fractal is the place for you. Fractal ANZ needs a Business Development Manager to focus on growing our Clients, rather than developing business within well-established accounts. If you have a sharply honed consulting style, this is your chance to be an integral part of our own growth and revenue achievements. You will also target top executives of previously untapped potential Must Win Clients (MWC) companies, drive the pivotal moment where leads become sales, and reap the rewards of negotiating contracts through to a successful close.</p> <p> <br> <strong> <u> How You Will Make an Impact/ Job Responsibilities:</u> </strong> <br>  Planning, design and development of Azure, AWS and other Cloud deployment<br>  Working closely with client and delivering outcomes per the SoW and SLA<br>  Architect, design, develop, deploy and document new systems or maintain existing systems on Cloud Platforms based on specifications.<br>  Collaborate with, provide continuous guidance to, and influence design decisions of various Agile development teams for various existing and new products and solutions w.r.t. Cloud enablement, migration and infrastructure needs, to adopt and promote Cloud best practices, and economies of scale.<br>  Engage customers understand their use cases and operational needs, as well as engage with Cloud Platform vendors to understand their technology roadmaps and evolution and translate to comprehensive technology guidance for various product teams.<br>  Design for Cloud security and compliance ensure solutions and operations reliability.<br>  Drive and conduct audits on current cloud utilization and recommend cloud optimization and security changes.<br>  Act as a mentor and technical consultant for the various teams.</p> <p> <u> <strong> Desired/Preferred Skills:</strong> </u> <br>  Well versed with IaaS and PaaS services of AWS, Azure and GCP<br>  Understand the technical financial organizational requirements constraints of enterprise customers and work closely with multiple teams to lead cloud enabled solutions<br>  Demonstrate ability to architect enterprise ready secure and scalable solution in cloud optimized for cost.<br>  Hands on experience with container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, OCI, etc.) and microservices architecture.<br>  Hands on experience with Unix and Linux based systems, shell scripting<br>  Effectively communicate the target state architecture topology on cloud to clients<br>  Strong cloud networking knowledge with VPC and endpoints<br>  Solid understanding of design principles for resilient, scalable, high-performing distributed applications<br>   Experience with automation, orchestration, CI/CD<br>  Ability to work on multiple projects, collaborate effectively with multiple teams and be flexible to adapt to changing requirements.<br>  Have worked with external client, managed client expectation and delivery<br>  Understanding of compliance requirement - ISO, PCI-DSS and HIPAA security requirement and implementation of this on cloud<br>  Good understanding of Infrastructure as a Code script like Terraform, Cloud Formation etc.</p> <p> <br> </p> <p> <u> <strong> Years of Experience:</strong> </u> <br>  6 to 7 years experince<br>  3 to 4 years of experience in architecture or infrastructure</p> <p> <br> </p> <p> <u> <strong> Education Qualification:</strong> </u> <br>  B.E / B.Tech, BCA, MCA equivalent<br>  Cloud Architect certification preferred</p> <br>

<STRONG> <SPAN> Introduction</SPAN> <SPAN> </SPAN> </STRONG> <BR> As an IBM Application Architect, you directly help clients transform their business and solve complex problems. You will define the scope and vision for projects that deliver customized solutions using your knowledge of IBM platforms. You are a technical leader, serving as a liaison among business partners, technical resources, and project stakeholders. <BR> <BR> <SPAN> <STRONG> Your Role and Responsibilities</STRONG> </SPAN> <SPAN> </SPAN>  <BR> <BR> <B> <SPAN> Who you are</SPAN> </B> <BR> A Cloud Architect is an IT specialist you will be responsible for deploying overseeing a IBM Client's cloud computing strategy. This includes cloud adoption plans, cloud application design, and cloud management and monitoring. Cloud architects oversee application architecture and deployment in cloud environments. <BR> <BR> <B> <SPAN> What you'll do</SPAN> </B> <BR> The cloud architect should be passionate about building following six key relationships:<BR> <OL> <LI> Advisory-level access to senior-level IT leaders (e.g., director/VP/CIO), either directly or through the EA team</LI> <LI> Direct and collaborative to senior EA teams and access to domain architecture teams (e.g., application or infrastructure architecture,solution, domain and service) architects and teams (e.g., infrastructure, application, security, data, identity, governance, procurement and finance)</LI> </OL> <B> <SPAN> How we'll help you grow:</SPAN> </B> <BR> <UL> <LI> You'll have access to all the technical and management training courses ought to become the guide you want to be.</LI> <LI> You'll learn directly from guide developers.</LI> <LI> You have the opportunity to work in many different areas to resolve out what really excites you </LI> </UL> <p><b>Required Candidate profile</b></p><STRONG><SPAN>Required Technical and Professional Expertise</SPAN><SPAN></SPAN><BR></STRONG><UL><LI>Should have 10+years of experience in cloud technologies</LI><LI>You will oversee application architecture - including public cloud, private cloud and hybrid cloud. Additionally, cloud architects act as consultants to their organization and need to stay up-to-date on the latest trends and issues. </LI><LI>Architects ensure service-level agreement requirements are met</LI></UL><P><STRONG><SPAN></SPAN></STRONG> </P><P><STRONG><SPAN>Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise</SPAN><SPAN></SPAN><BR></P></STRONG><UL><LI>Good interpersonal skills - Effective verbal & written communication - especially with Sr. client stakeholders such as CMOs, CDOs, CIOs, CTOs </LI><LI>Certified Solutions Architect on anyone of the following Clouds is must: AWS, Azure, Google or IBM. Hands-on experience on any of the mentioned cloud is must.</LI><LI>Good knowledge of at least one operating system: Linux, Unix, Solaris, Ubuntu, Windows. Preference is any LINUX flavored operating system (eg: Ubuntu or Red Hat). </LI></UL>

 •	Lead or participated in large-scale eCommerce implementations, utilizing Salesforce Commerce Cloud, providing both oversight and hands on contributions to the software design, development, and integration

Job Description:
Key skills required for the job are: n Telco Cloud-L2, (Mandatory) and Telecommunication-L3, (Optional).As a Senior Architect, you are responsible for providing technical leadership to medium size/complexity/order-value enterprise scale projects/solutions. You are expected have depth of knowledge of specified multiple technological areas, which includes knowledge of applicable processes, methodologies, standards, products and frameworks. You would be responsible for defining and documenting architecture, capturing and documenting non-functional (architectural) requirements, preparing estimates and defining technical solutions to proposals (RFPs). You should provide technical leadership to project team(s) to perform design to deployment related activities, provide guidance, perform reviews, prevent and resolve technical issues. You are required to guide team of Architects, who would be responsible specific architectural area or part of the architecture/solution. You need to collaborate with multiple teams from wipro/customer to arrive at technical and tactical decisions. Minimum work experience: >10 YEARS

You are expected have depth of knowledge of specified multiple technological areas, which includes knowledge of applicable processes, methodologies, standards, products and frameworks. You would be responsible for defining and documenting architecture, capturing and documenting non-functional (architectural) requirements, preparing estimates and defining technical solutions to proposals (RFPs). You should provide technical leadership to project team(s) to perform design to deployment related activities, provide guidance, perform reviews, prevent and resolve technical issues. You are required to guide team of Architects, who would be responsible specific architectural area or part of the architecture/solution. You need to collaborate with multiple teams from wipro/customer to arrive at technical and tactical decisions. Minimum work experience: >10 YEARS

html_job_description:
Urgent opening for Cloud Architect for one of our reputed corporate clients in Kolkata. This is for a role of a Specialist Cloud Architect who will be a part of the company's core IT Team and lead the planning, deployment, migration and support for all Cloud hosted IT Infrastructure of the organization.
The details are mentioned below. In case you are interested about the role please send your updated resume along with your CTC details immediately. Else please feel free to share this role with your network. For any clarification please call 9674484100.
Essential Skills:
- Experience of migration of IT Infra and IT Services to Public Cloud Platform
- Expert knowledge of Amazon Cloud (AWS) or MS Cloud (Azure) architecture and operations
- Experience of supporting IT Infra and Services in Public Cloud hosted platforms
- Excellent knowledge of Systems Administration/ IT Landscape Design and Systems Architecture
- Adequate working knowledge of DB, OS, Server Management, Data Center Operations, Virtualization, Storage/ SAN, Data Recovery and other IT Support services and IT Security
- Knowledge of SAP R3/ SAP Hana Systems Administration will be an added advantage
Job Role:
The ideal candidate is expected to lead Cloud Migration of the existing IT Infrastructure including ERP/ Servers/ Database/ Data Center etc. along with various IT applications and IT Security systems. The role shall lead the Cloud migration, operations and support function ensuring minimum disruption in systems' availability, "zero-loss" of data and maximum uptime. The candidate shall have the overall accountability right from requirement analysis, project blueprint, technology evaluation to landscape design, cloud platform selection, system architecture design, vendor evaluation & vendor management, go live, post go live support & trouble shooting. Besides, he shall also play the role of a Project Manager to manage/ support/ trouble-shoot all IT Systems & IT Services thus hosted on the Public Cloud platform.
Requirements:
The ideal candidate should be open to relocate to Kolkata for medium to long term. He/ She should have adequate Technical & Managerial skills required for the job. The broad requirements are given below:
1) Education & Experience: MCA/ M. Tech/ B. Tech/ M. Sc - Computer Science (full time course from a reputed University) with 5 to 8 years of relevant experience as a Cloud Administrator/ Cloud Solutions Consultant/ Cloud Architect / Cloud specialist
2) Specific Cloud Exposure: Must have worked on at least one complete OS/ DB migration to Cloud Platforms (Public Cloud). Must have a very good understanding of existing and evolving Cloud Technologies and Platforms so as to evaluate options/ combinations and recommend the best possible option for the organization. Working knowledge of deploying/ migrating/ supporting IT Infrastructure AWS Cloud or Azure Cloud is mandatory. Else must have excellent exposure in at least 2 other Public Cloud platforms. Good working knowledge of Cloud Platform Integration, Hybrid Cloud environment and management of IT Infra & IT Services in a Cloud Hosted environment is required for the role
3) System Architecture & System Administration Experience: Hands on experience in Systems Architecture design/ System Administration (including multiple Operating Systems, Databases, ERP and other IT Application) with substantial knowledge of managing various IT applications, IT Network & Infrastructure and Security. System Administration exposure in SAP R3/ SAP HANA environment will be an added advantage. Must have good knowledge of System Design/ Landscape Design, DB & OS migration, Data Center transition, Disaster Recovery etc. 
The ideal candidate should have good communication and people management skills as it will lead a team and also closely interact with different functions, vendors and IT service providers.

Job Description

 Job Description :
 Inviting applications for the role of Cloud Architect
 where we are looking for a candidate with a strong focus on Infrastructure and Applications to help our customers adopt private, public and hybrid cloud solutions. You will help customers defining their cloud strategy and architect and implement specific solutions as customers move to Microsoft Azure/AWS or other cloud platforms. This is a highly technical customer-facing delivery role that will be accountable for the design and deliver end-to-end customer cloud implementation and deployment experience. candidate must be an expert in one or more Azure Cloud or AWS offerings and comfortable discussing solutions with clients.
 In this role, you would be responsible for
 . Interfacing with customers to determine technical requirements, feasibility, and expectations.
 . Strategizing with prospects and customers to develop solutions based on a variety of criteria including a clear description of services, functionality, scalability, future-proofing, and cost.
 . Partnering with the sales team to help qualify opportunities, determine strategy and close deals.
 . Designing and communicating compelling solutions that urge prospects to take the desired action.
 . Design Cloud-based solutions using cloud computing architectural procedures that typically consist of front-end platform, back end platforms, cloud-based delivery, and a network.
 . Implement cloud computing architecture solutions that address cloud security and compliance fundamentals, deployment automation and elastic sizing of environments, and multi-tenant implications
 . Design and implement multi-tier architecture solution that is highly available and fault-tolerant using Azure/AWS platform services
 . Design and implement effective cloud computing solutions that consider an organization's structure, communications, and operational business processes, including financial management and cost model implications
 . Manage the process of migrating and transitioning to a cloud environment
 . Manage the implementation of the cloud to ensure a successful deployment
 Qualifications
 Minimum qualifications
 . Hands-on experience with one or more Public Clouds (AWS / Azure)
 . Experience configuring On-premises to Cloud Connectivity (i.e. VPNs, Direct Connections, and Hybrid Cloud Solutions)
 . Strong Experience on JAVA /JEE or Microsoft Technologies
 . Knowledge of TCP/IP protocol and firewalls
 . Linux OS/Server and Windows Server experience
 . Scripting (one or more of Python/JavaScript/Perl)
 . Knowledge of Security as it relates to Cloud Environments including the Shared Security Model
 . Understanding of HA architecture (clustering,RAC, ADG, fail over etc.), multiple DC architecture, multi cloud integration
 . A high level of customer facing time,requirements gathering, architecting solutions, presenting internally and externally to customers.
 Preferred qualifications
. Experience supporting sales opportunities through their life cycle including qualification, discovery, solution design,customer presentations, business case development & RFP Responses.
 . Knowledge of automation tools (ansible,terra form preferred)
 . Knowledge about Virtual Machines. Container concepts would be a plus.
 Genpact is an Equal Opportunity Employer and considers applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, religion or belief, sex, age, national origin, citizenship status, marital status, military/veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, physical or mental disability or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws.
 Genpact is committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, respect and integrity, customer focus, and innovation. For more information, visit (https://www.youtube.com/user/GenpactLtd) .
 Genpact India

Posotion: Technical Operations Leader <br> Location: Mumbai <br> Salary: 20 to 40 lacs (Open for right person)  <br>   <br>Experience<br>6- 15 years including at least 3 years leading people<br>Experience with 24/ 7 global operations in an industry where technology is critical to business results.<br>Must have experience leading each of application,  operating system,  network,  and server/ storage technologies for high performance and security.<br>Responsibility<br>Take ownership of production applications.<br>Initially,  contribute to hardening the legacy platform. This will include getting current state facts,  simplifying and consolidating,  defining and executing tests,  and implementing management and monitoring. Later,  assume accountability to maintain reliability for the new platform.<br>Continually improve reliability,  latency,  volume,  cost and ease of management including influencing peers to make changes.<br>Bring thought leadership and expertise on how to design bulletproof,  massively scaled platforms.<br>Metrics<br>Final point of accountability for multiple,  mission- critical applications.<br>Managed at least 8 people for at least 3 years.<br>Technology<br>Technical mastery at the application,  operating system,  network,  and server/ storage levels.<br>Windows:<br>Linux:<br>Network:<br>Server:<br>Storage:<br>Strongly prefer expertise with SQL Server,  but can be experienced with any major database. They should know how to optimize database performance,  and guide where to use relational stores relative other data management options.<br>Understand the relationship of infrastructure to software performance,  and able to guide infrastructure decisions to achieve high degrees of scalability with low latency.<br>Management and monitoring:<br>Prefer exposure to application performance management tools such as Dynatrace or Ruxit.<br>Should have certifications earlier in their career.<br>Process<br>Exposure to ITIL is useful but not critical.<br>Prefer experience working within a mature agile model including continuous or automated deployment.<br>Domain expertise<br>Lean methods (kaizen,  Toyota approach) exposure is positive.<br>Attributes<br>The candidate should bring a high sense of urgency,  close attention to detail,  and a disciplined approach. They should be energetic and ready to take complete ownership of platform performance.<br>Experience working in other global financial centers,  such as London or New York,  is positive.<br>We value intelligence; self- sufficient drive to reliably perform high quality tasks with minimal direction; and integrity to treat people well,  do what they say,  and contribute to a culture based on trust.

Posotion: Technical Operations Leader <br> Location: Mumbai <br> Salary: 20 to 40 lacs (Open for right person)  <br>   <br>Experience<br>6- 15 years including at least 3 years leading people<br>Experience with 24/ 7 global operations in an industry where technology is critical to business results.<br>Must have experience leading each of application,  operating system,  network,  and server/ storage technologies for high performance and security.<br>Responsibility<br>Take ownership of production applications.<br>Initially,  contribute to hardening the legacy platform. This will include getting current state facts,  simplifying and consolidating,  defining and executing tests,  and implementing management and monitoring. Later,  assume accountability to maintain reliability for the new platform.<br>Continually improve reliability,  latency,  volume,  cost and ease of management including influencing peers to make changes.<br>Bring thought leadership and expertise on how to design bulletproof,  massively scaled platforms.<br>Metrics<br>Final point of accountability for multiple,  mission- critical applications.<br>Managed at least 8 people for at least 3 years.<br>Technology<br>Technical mastery at the application,  operating system,  network,  and server/ storage levels.<br>Windows:<br>Linux:<br>Network:<br>Server:<br>Storage:<br>Strongly prefer expertise with SQL Server,  but can be experienced with any major database. They should know how to optimize database performance,  and guide where to use relational stores relative other data management options.<br>Understand the relationship of infrastructure to software performance,  and able to guide infrastructure decisions to achieve high degrees of scalability with low latency.<br>Management and monitoring:<br>Prefer exposure to application performance management tools such as Dynatrace or Ruxit.<br>Should have certifications earlier in their career.<br>Process<br>Exposure to ITIL is useful but not critical.<br>Prefer experience working within a mature agile model including continuous or automated deployment.<br>Domain expertise<br>Lean methods (kaizen,  Toyota approach) exposure is positive.<br>Attributes<br>The candidate should bring a high sense of urgency,  close attention to detail,  and a disciplined approach. They should be energetic and ready to take complete ownership of platform performance.<br>Experience working in other global financial centers,  such as London or New York,  is positive.<br>We value intelligence; self- sufficient drive to reliably perform high quality tasks with minimal direction; and integrity to treat people well,  do what they say,  and contribute to a culture based on trust.

html_job_description:
UNIT NO(S) B - 20 & B - 21, CIPET ROAD 
 Site Reliability December 3, 2019
 Responsibilities 
Manager - Technical Operations
The Manager of Technical Operations is responsible for running the VeloCloud s (now part of VMware) award winning Cloud - Delivered SD - WAN Service. If you have the passion for planning, designing and running a global network service with world class reliability, and love to be part of a growing, no - nonsense enthusiastic team, then we want to talk to you!

  • Design and plan VeloCloud s cloud network reach and expand into new geographies which will include new global POP locations in colocation style facilities

  • Manage day - to - day operations of VeloCloud s cloud network service and ensure high availability

  • Manage a Technical Operations and the NOC team with 24x7x365 on - call coverage

  • Drive security compliance efforts

  • Project management for the team and alignment with the external stakeholders

    • Requirements

    • Hands on experience in running network services in public cloud

    • Ability to inspire and lead a group of senior engineers through the design and

      implementation phases of services

    • Strong analytical and problem - solving skills

    • Deep knowledge of performance and site reliability issues

    • Understanding of Datacenter operations and standard practices

    • BS in CSECE or equivalent or 5 years experience in providing technical and management leadership

    • Previous technical expertise

    • Personal Attributes

    • Detail oriented, good at follow - through

    • Ability to work independently in a fast paced unstructured environment.

    • Excellent presentation and communication skills combined with the ability to work in a team environment

    • A team player, when things need to get done you are in the weeds working hard so you can play hard later


    • Category : Engineering and Technology
      Subcategory: Site Reliability
      Manager and Professional
      Full Time Part Time: Full Time
      Work From Home: No
      Posted Date: 2019 - 12 - 03

       

,

There are off shift activities and pager rotation . <br><br>5) Troubleshoot end to end network security issues<br><br>6) Conduct risk assessments on all work performed .  . <br><br>7) Conduct daily ,  weekly ,  and monthly proactive maintenance activities including configuration changes and code upgrades per business directive . <br><br>8) 6-8 years of experience . Check Point Security Gateway on Nokia/SPLAT/Gaia, Checkpoint UTM (2073,3073, 3075) Secure Platform and VSX platform, Checkpoint NG. Juniper Netscreen, Juniper SSG (140, 520, 550) and SRX (100, 210, 240) .IDP:- Juniper IDS (200, 250, 800, 1000, 2000) & McAfee IPSLoad Balancers:- F5 (1600,3600,3900,6400)Event Management:- HP Arc Sight SIEM Express & Logger (7200)UTM:- Fortinet (80,110,300, 1000)</p> <br> </p><br>			</div><br>		<div><br>				 <br>					additional information <br>				<p><br>					<p>Responsibilities </p> <p>In line with our ITIL based processes and organization, you will be in charge to follow Orange internal processes and manage:-</p> <p>Incident management</p> <p>- handle both re-active (customer call) and pro-active (monitoring) incidents</p> <p>- troubleshoot and fix all incidents in close relationship with all people involved in the fault resolution process: level 1 (CTS2, DCSC,  ), IT CSM, field operations, supplier helpdesk, Infrastructure and Engineering teams.</p> <p>- provide root cause analysis (RCA)</p> <p>Ability to work in a virtual team environment.</p> <p>Problem management</p> <p>- involved in problem management as the owner of the technical resolution</p> <p>Change management</p> <p>- handle standard change request, according to our change control and risk review process</p> <p>- handle complex change requests, providing technical expertise and reporting to the change advisory board (CAB) as appropriate</p> <p>Security Incident and Event Management</p> <p>- monitor and respond to alarms and alerts from the SIEM and IDP solutions (triage / notification / recommendation / etc  )</p> <p>- working closely with Technical Operations Owners / Security Managers and with the customer/customer SOC, to manage incident response coordination and follow-up</p> <br> </p><br>			</div>

<b> Who we are looking for?</b> <br> We are looking for a full stack developer experienced with atleast 2 years on front end and back end technologies (MEAN/ MERN Stack).<div> <br> <br> <b> Responsibilities</b> :<br> <ul> <li> 	Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server side logic.</li> <li> 	Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code.</li> <li> 	Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications.</li> <li> 	Implementation of security and data protection.</li> <li> 	Integration of data storage solutions {{may include databases (mySQL, MongoDb), key-value stores (Redis, Memcache).</li> <li> 	He should has knowledge of MEAN or MERN Stack.</li> </ul> <br> <b> Skills and Qualifications</b> :<br> <ul> the nature of asynchronous programming and its quirks and workarounds.</li> <li> 	Good understanding of server-side templating languages.</li> <li> 	Good understanding of server-side CSS Job Description:

   Designs, develops, troubleshoots and debugs software programs for software enhancements and new products. Develops software including operating systems, compilers, routers, networks, utilities, databases and Internet-related tools. Determines hardware compatibility and/or influences hardware design.Responsibilities:

  • Designs enhancements, updates, and programming changes for portions and subsystems of systems software, including operating systems, compliers, networking, utilities, databases, and Internet-related tools.
  • Analyzes design and determines coding, programming, and integration activities required based on general objectives and knowledge of overall architecture of product or solution.
  • Writes and executes complete testing plans, protocols, and documentation for assigned portion of application; identifies and debugs, and creates solutions for issues with code and integration into application architecture.
  • Leads a project team of other software systems engineers and internal and outsourced development partners to develop reliable, cost effective and high quality solutions for assigned systems portion or subsystem.
  • Collaborates and communicates with management, internal, and outsourced development partners regarding software systems design status, project progress, and issue resolution.
  • Represents the software systems engineering team for all phases of larger and more-complex development projects. Provides guidance and mentoring to less- experienced staff members.
  • Provides guidance and mentoring to less- experienced staff members.
Education and Experience Required:
  • Bachelor''s or Master''s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent.
  • Typically 4-6 years experience.

  • Expertise in multiple software systems design tools and languages.
  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills.
  • Designing software systems running on multiple platform types.
  • Software systems testing methodology, including writing and execution of test plans, debugging, and testing scripts and tools.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills; mastery in English and local language. Ability to effectively communicate product architectures, design proposals and negotiate options at management levels..
