(Linux, Vert.x)<br> <br> - Deployment of systems in Cloud<br> <br> - UML,JDBC, JMS, messaging, WebSockets, REST<br> <br> - RDBMS<br> <br> - Exposure to DevOps tools like TeamCity, Gradle, Ansible, Linux scripting,<br> <br> - Preferable in NoSQL<br> <br> Role :<br> <br> - Work with tech architects and build critical systems that can not afford downtime. <br> <br> - Having experience in resilient systems (HA) and also illustrated ability to learn quickly and open to adopt to different technology as needed. <br> <br> - Ownership for the completion of the projects, and building the monitoring ability in the code itself

html_job_description:
Dell Overview:

Dell provides the technology that transforms the way we all work and live. But we are more than a technology company — we are a people company. We inspire, challenge and respect every one of our over 100,000 employees. We also provide them with unparalleled growth and development opportunities. We can’t wait for you to discover this for yourself as a Software Senior Principal Engineer on our team in Bangalore.

About Business Unit:

The Client Solutions Group team delivers next-generation software application enhancements and new products for a changing world. Working at the cutting edge, we design and develop software for platforms, peripherals, applications and diagnostics — all with the most advanced technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and the collaboration of internal and external partners.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Gathers business requirements and participates in product definition and feature prioritization, including customer usability studies.
  • Prepares, reviews and analyzes software specifications for business requirements
  • Leads the design and architecture of high-quality, complex systems and software
  • Conceives and defines concepts for products, systems and solutions
  • Develops and produces concept prototypes
  • Provides technical expertise and support for next generation initiatives
  • Participates in internal and industry forums where appropriate
  • Acts as a point of escalation for critical development issues
  • Takes the lead in shaping future products
  • Provides expertise on multiple technologies/products
  • Generates IP including multiple invention disclosures per year
  • Owner of multiple or highly complex technologies
  • Influences others through their professional/technical expertise

Principal Accountabilities                                                                                                 
  • Develops long-term technology strategies based on the technical and business information they maintain. The strategy is developed with knowledge from the industry, marketing, development, manufacturing, procurement and customer input.
  • Drives for internal and external alignment of the strategy.
  • Identifies and develops differentiation opportunities, provide technical information and make recommendations to marketing, procurement, engineering, customers, and business executives. Takes a leading role in strategic technical forums and meetings on a regular and consistent schedule.
  • Assists development as required when working tactical/time-to-market development issues.
  • Supports Customer briefings and presents technical data on Dell’s product and industry direction in a convincing and authoritative form.
  • Responsible for generating intellectual property and supporting Dell’s legal team by providing technical support on intellectual property disputes.
  • Participates as required in strategic initiatives for improvements in process, quality, and cost.
  • Provides full design, planning, configuration, documentation, deployment and top-level support ownership of product technologies. Identifies design requirements and makes recommendations for capacity planning, performance optimization and future direction
  • Leads in the software development lifecycle, which includes research, new development, modification, security, correction of errors, reuse, re-engineering and maintenance of software products.
  • Manages or utilizes software that is built and implemented as a product, using best-in-class development process/lifecycle management (ex: Agile, Waterfall).
  • Performs competitive analysis for features at a product level scope. 
  • Drives idea generation for new software products, or for the next version of an existing product. 
  • Protects Intellectual property by working appropriate legal elements (ex: procurement, patents, open source).
  • Responsible for the delivery of products within budget, schedule and quality guidelines.
  • Works with the team to develop, maintain, and communicate current development schedules, timelines and development status.
  • Designs and develops major functional or performance enhancements for existing products, or produces new software products or tools.
  • Able to constructively coach less senior engineers


Essential Requirements:
  • Proficient in developing high performance, scalable and highly secured web applications.
  • Advanced knowledge of programming languages; operating systems; databases; system, network, and application administration; tools and utilities
  • Able to code and effectively guide others to code flexible and scalable programs that meet complex requirements
  • Experience with, and able to provide leadership in all phases of software development: feasibility, design, implementation, integration, test and delivery
  • Tech Skills
    • 15+ years professional software development advanced experience in Java and related technology
    • Core Stack is Java 8, Spring, RESTful Web Services API Development
    • Strong understanding of front-end technologies such as JavaScript, jQuery, Backbone, as well as proficiency in HTML5 and CSS3
    • Extensive knowledge and hands-on experience in Java frameworks available such as Spring MVC, Spring Security, Spring Data
    • Strong experience in ORM technology like hibernate
    • Strong proficiency in Multi-threading, Web servers like tomcat, apache, caching technology like Memcache
    • Extensive experience in SQL and No SQL database like MySQL, MongoDB, MariaDB
    • Experience in application security (Threat Modeling, CVSS, Vulnerabilities, addressing PEN test issues etc.)
    • Solid Object-Oriented Programming Experience
    • Understanding design principles behind cloud based and scalable applications
    • Solid understanding of Client – Server Architecture, Multi-tier Application
    • Solid understanding of the nature of asynchronous programming and its quirks and workarounds
    • Experience implementing test-driven development and hands on with Junit cases
    • Understanding fundamental principles behind cross site scripting, browser caching, cookie management.
    • Strong knowledge on Queue/Broker Services - MQTT
    • Strong knowledge on Microservices Architecture
    • Strong understanding of architecture and software design patterns.
  • Familiar with Agile methodology and DevOps
  • Ability to communicate design rationale and build consensus
  • Strong in fundamentals in the area of device management, Good to have knowledge on Thin Clients domain
  • Cultivates, develops and manages strong relationship with team members.
  • Should possess excellent communication skills both verbal and written

Experience

15+ years of relevant experience
Education :  Bachelors’s/Master’s degree in Electronics, Computer Science or equivalent

Benefits:

We offer highly competitive salaries, bonus programs, world-class benefits, and unparalleled growth and development opportunities — all to create a compelling and rewarding work environment.

Our EVP:
Our Culture Code unites us and makes us a great family of companies and a great place to work. It’s how we run the business, go to market, work together and provide inspirational leadership.
Our culture code is defined by our values and are made real every day by defining expectations for how we work and how we lead.

Apply now!
Dell is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Dell are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Dell will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Learn more about Diversity and Inclusion at Dell here.

 Job Description :
 Job Role:
A Full Stack developer is responsible for both front or back-end development or both. You’ll be the brain behind crafting, developing, testing, going live and maintaining the system. You are passionate in understanding the business context for features built to drive better customer experience and adoption.
 Responsibilities:
As a Full Stack developer you must have knowledge in all stages of software development.
You’ll be working alongside other engineers and developers, collaborating on the various layers of the infrastructure for our product.
Comply with coding standards and technical design.
Believes in a systematic approach to developing the system through clear documentation (flowcharts, layouts, & etc) of functionality, address every use case through creative solutions.
Adapts structured coding styles for easy review, testing and maintainability of the code.
Integrate the developed functionality and/or component into a fully functional system.
Ensure unit and integration level verification plan are in place and adheres to great quality of code at all time.
Actively participate in troubleshooting, debugging and updating current live system.
Verify user feedback in making the system more stable and easy to use.
Work closely with analysts, designers and other peer developers.
Preparing technical training documents for on-boarding new engineers.
 Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent practical experience.
Understanding of OOPS concepts, Persistence, Threading.
Proficient in Java, C++, Ruby on Rails or other programming languages.
Proficient knowledge of advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks such as VueJS, ReactJS
Knowledge of SQL or NoSQL database.
Knowledgeable in data structures and algorithms.
Sound verbal and written communication skills.
Knowledge of AWS, Azure, Google or Openstack will be a plus.
Knowledge of code versioning tools such as Git
 Skillset:
HTML5, Javascript ES6, CSS
Scripting language: React js or Vue js
Language : Java or Ruby
Or experience with MERN stack

html_job_description:
The applications developer will be part of IT enterprise applications and platform development team. Our organization develop, build and supports Enterprise Help Desk system and the productization effort, Search Platform, VMWare s intranet, Identity and Access Management System and custom Legal and HR applications. We aimed to bring colleague productivity and experience to the next level. The position will participate in building innovative applications using latest technologies like K8s, modern UI framework, machine learning, search engines, decoupled CMS and combine with Agile development, CI/CD and dev- ops practices to achieve high performance delivery model. 
 Role Responsibilities
  • Ensure that the developer come up with the best possible technical solutions and that those solutions fully meet the client objective
  • Deliver functionality across several sites for large enterprise customers
  • Improve the quality of Drupal development on assigned projects
  • Adopts a team approach, acknowledging and appreciating efforts, contributions, and compromises.
  • To be part of the web team to help plan, design develop dynamic features using Drupal
  • Demonstrates integrity by aligning VMware s values with behaviors.
  • Must be motivated, independent and self- sufficient. Able to receive an assigned task and see it through to completion with minimal supervision.
  • Develops software solutions by studying requirements analysis and information needs; conferring with stakeholders and IT Management; studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes; performs software design using software development fundamentals and processes, debug, test, and deploy software solutions. .
  • Actively participate in product design reviews by providing creative and practical ideas and solutions in a teamwork environment. A wide degree of creativity and latitude required.

Requirements:

  • Minimum 7+ years of experience on software development experience with CMS platforms
  • Expert Knowledge in Drupal 7 8
  • Hands on experience in developing Custom Contributed Modules using Drupal
  • Excellent experience in developing creative Drupal Themes
  • Strong in front- end coding with PHP and backend DB with MySQL
  • Advanced experience on Drupal Coding and Customization
  • Solid understanding of LAMP internals and resource management
  • Hands on UI technologies like JavaScript/jQuery/Angular/React , HTML and CSS
  • Should help in maintaining existing websites and provide technical support for Product Owners
  • Creating new web layouts/themes using Drupal Modules
  • Excellent experience on Rest APIs and Microservices development.

Preferred:

  • Familiarity with Microservices and Serverless architectures.
  • Experience with industry leading CI/CD practices and build configuration management.
  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or the equivalent combination of education, training, or work experience.

job_description: <b> Objective of the Role:</b> <br> <br> We are here to build a world-class tech organization with elite engineers and change-agents who would spearhead this change. Currently, we are looking for engineers who are skilled, passionate, driven and a wee bit crazy (yes, crazy works!) to join our tribe.The current position is for the supply chain teams and our primary focus is on scale and cost optimization. The small tweaks you make, the processes you alter, experiments you run and the business decisions you drive will have reverberating effects on our ability to add value to our customers and keep them coming back for more.<br> <br> <b> Role & Responsibilities:<br> </b> <br> Design and build the system which enables the logistics team to store and deliver 15 million products per month to customers across 20 cities in India<br> <br> Work on the vision, roadmap, and processes that make customer delivery experience more delightful<br> <br> Work across teams to design a platform that scales and is flexible enough for various kinds of future scenarios<br> <br> Work on optimizing the whole logistics supply chain from warehouse to customer<br> <br> Innovate to improve the efficiency of the existing supply chain systems<br> <b> <br> Desired skills & abilities:</b> <br> <br> 1-3 years of experience in software development<br> <br> B.Tech. / B.E. degree in Computer Science or equivalent software engineering degree/experience<br> <br> Good understanding of Web fundamentals like HTML, JavaScript and CSS<br> <br> Knowledge of CSS preprocessors like Sass or LESS<br> <br> Experience working on JavaScript frameworks/libraries React-Redux, VueJS is a plus<br> <br> Experience in JS-based build tools like Webpack, grunt & gulp<br> <br> Hands-on experience in Restful services<br> <br> Knowledge of server-side languages like PHP, Python, Ruby, Java, JavaScript and .Net<br> <br> Experience in database technologies like MySQL, Oracle., PostgreSQL and MongoDB<br> <br> Experience in web server technologies like Node.js, J2EE, Apache, Nginx and ISS<br> <br> Experience in frameworks related to the server-side language of choice like Express.js, SpringBoot, Django<br> <br> Solid experience in software development practices like code reviews, coding guidelines, refactoring, design patterns<br> <br> Exposure to Agile/Scrum and Design thinking approaches

<b> Responsibilities<br> </b> <br> Take ownership of product's architecture, database and servers.<br> Research and apply best practices of software development to build world class product.<br> Involvement across all aspects of the product code base (Current and future).<br> <br> <b> Requirements</b> <div> <br> Strong Logical and Analytical skills.<br> Extensive experience in LAMP and/ or MEAN Stack.<br> Javascript Framework/ Library experience a bonus.<br> Extensive experience in, and understanding of OOPS & MVC concepts.<br> Strong back-end background; Experienced in Restful APIs, DB Mgt & SQL.<br> Consumer Tech Orientation.<br> Excited at the problem being solved.<br> Individual contributor; As well as ability to work in and eventually lead a team.<br>  </div>

- Building site features, automation, admin tools and integrate APIs<br>- Debugging any issues in existing dashboards<br>- Developing new innovative SAAS softwares related to Marketing & Advertising<br>- Developing a CRM platform to track clicks and visits<br><br><p><b>Required Candidate profile</b></p>Desired Skills<br><br>- Strong PHP development experience<br>- Excellent grasp of front-end & Backend technologies: JavaScript / HTML5 / CSS, Db, Bootstrap, WordPress<br>- Must have good Analytical and Problem-solving skill<br>- Can think and work independently.

Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes <BR> <BR> - Familiarity with SQLNoSQL databases and their declarative query languages <BR> <BR> Web Frontend Skillset : <BR> <BR> - Good understanding and working experience of CMS based Web solutions <BR> <BR> - Sound understanding of Cloud, Analytics <BR> <BR> - Platform orientation towards Node.js frameworks <BR> <BR> - Web development has many faces. But no matter the type of development you're thinking of pursuing, soft skills like attention to detail, ability to learn quickly,ability to solve problems efficiently, and strong communication will stand you in good stead on top of the hard skills outlined above. <BR> <P> <P> </P> </P>

| Overview At Rambus, we are turning incredible possibilities into everyday reality by helping to deliver the innovations that greatly impact the world we live in. We create leading-edge semiconductor and IP products, spanning memory and interfaces to security to smart sensors. Our products are integrated into tens of billions of devices and systems around the globe, running critical applications for Big Data, Internet of Things (IoT), mobile, consumer and media platforms. And our history runs deep we have been in Silicon Valley for 25+ years and are continually anticipating key technology trends and are developing innovations that drive market changes. From a pure IP provider to becoming a fabless chipmaker, Rambus is evolving to address critical challenges in the semiconductor industry. As a dynamic organization, we are always seeking to hire exceptional talent to join some of the brightest inventors and engineers in the world to explore their passions to develop products that have real life impact. As well, Rambus benefits are among the most comprehensive and competitive in Silicon Valley. Incident Response Respond to computer security incidents according to the security incident process. Provide guidance to first responders for handling information security incidents. Coordinate efforts among multiple departments during response. Provide timely and relevant updates to appropriate stakeholders and decision makers. Provide investigation findings to relevant business units to help improve information security posture. Validate and maintain incident response plan and processes to address potential threats. Write scripts and configure tools to automate analysis Compile and analyze data for management reporting and metrics. Threat Management Monitor information security related Web sites (US-CERT, SANS Internet Storm Center, etc.) and mailing lists (DHS Infrastructure, BugTraq, etc. to stay up to date on current attacks and trends. Analyze potential impact of new threats and exploits and communicate risks. Perform hunting in logs and security tools for signs of compromise or breach Vulnerability Management Monitor information security related Web sites (US-CERT, SANS Internet Storm Center, etc.) and mailing lists (DHS Infrastructure, BugTraq, etc. to stay up to date on current attacks and trends. Interpret penetration results and validate closure Use vulnerability and web application scanner to monitor for vulnerabilities and ensure tickets are assigned and tracked to meet patching SLA Work with solution engineers to test and configure the WAF to patch web server vulnerabilities and prevent breaches Report vulnerability management metrics Compliance Review and update procedures for ISO 27001 Ensure there is evidence for procedures being followed Perform regular reviews and internal audits as necessary Qualifications Five or more years of practical experience in an incident response role Advanced knowledge of information systems security concepts and technologies; network architecture; general database concepts; document management; hardware and software troubleshooting; intrusion tools; and computer forensic tools Familiarity with security regulatory requirements and standards (such as PCI DSS, ISO 27001 / 2, CSC Critical Controls) Advanced knowledge and experience with the Windows and Linux operating systems Working knowledge of and experience in investigating malicious code and packet captures Demonstrated ability to apply technical and analytical skills in a security environment Ability to work extremely well under pressure while maintaining a professional image and approach Exceptional information analysis abilities; ability to perform independent analysis and distill relevant findings and root cause Strong analytical writing skills to articulate complex ideas clearly and effectively; experience creating and presenting documentation and management reports Team player with proven ability to work effectively with other business units, IT management and staff, vendors, and consultants Strong communication skills such as planning and leading effective meetings, conducting structured interviews to collect information, interpersonal and negotiation skills, and presenting to a variety of audiences Advanced skills to present information to stakeholders and / or decision makers in an effective and professional deliverable Education / Certifications / Others Six or more years of technical experience in the information security field, preferably in this particular industry Bachelor’s degree in management information systems, computer science, or related discipline is required. Postgraduate degrees and certificate programs in relevant areas that demonstrate analytical writing will also be considered. CISSP certified SANS GCIH or GCFA, CISA, CISM, EnCER certification(s) preferred but not required. Must be able to work in afternoon shift and be on call during after-hours. Rambus offers a competitive compensation package, which includes a strong base salary, bonus, equity, matching 401(k), employee stock purchase plan, comprehensive medical and dental benefits, time-off program and gym membership. Rambus creates cutting-edge semiconductor and IP products, spanning memory and interfaces to security, smart sensors and lighting. Our chips, customizable IP cores, architecture licenses, tools, services, training and innovations improve the competitive advantage of our customers. We collaborate with the industry, partnering with leading ASIC and SoC designers, foundries, IP developers, EDA companies and validation labs. Our products are integrated into tens of billions of devices and systems, powering and securing diverse applications, including Big Data, Internet of Things (IoT), mobile, consumer and media platforms. At Rambus, we are makers of better. For more information about Rambus, visit rambus.com. For additional information on life at Rambus and our current openings, check out rambus.com / careers / .

appropriate stakeholders and decision makers. </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Provide investigation findings to relevant business units to help improve information security posture. </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Validate and maintain incident response plan and processes to address potential threats. </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Write scripts and configure tools to automate analysis </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Compile and analyze data for management reporting and metrics. </SPAN> </LI> </UL> <P> </P> <P> <SPAN> <EM> Threat Management </EM> </SPAN> </P> <UL> <LI> <SPAN> Monitor information security related Web sites (US-CERT, SANS Internet Storm Center, etc.) and mailing lists (DHS Infrastructure, BugTraq, etc.) to stay up to date on current attacks and trends. </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Analyze potential impact of new threats and exploits and communicate risks. </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Perform hunting in logs and security tools for signs of compromise or breach </SPAN> </LI> </UL> <P> </P> <P> <SPAN> <EM> Vulnerability Management </EM> </SPAN> </P> <UL> <LI> <SPAN> Monitor information security related Web sites (US-CERT, SANS Internet Storm Center, etc.) and mailing lists (DHS Infrastructure, BugTraq, etc.) to stay up to date on current attacks and trends. </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Interpret penetration results and validate closure </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Use vulnerability and web application scanner to monitor for vulnerabilities and ensure tickets are assigned and tracked to meet patching SLA </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Work with solution engineers to test and configure the WAF to patch web server vulnerabilities and prevent breaches </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Report vulnerability management metrics </SPAN> </LI> </UL> <P> <SPAN> Compliance </SPAN> </P> <UL> <LI> <SPAN> Review and update procedures for ISO 27001 </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Ensure there is evidence for procedures being followed </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Perform regular reviews and internal audits as necessary </SPAN> </LI> </UL> </DIV> </DIV> </DIV> Qualifications <DIV> <DIV> <DIV> <P> </P> <UL> <LI> <SPAN> Five or more years of practical experience in an incident response role </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Advanced knowledge of information systems security concepts and technologies; network architecture; general database concepts; document management; hardware and software troubleshooting; intrusion tools; and computer forensic tools </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Familiarity with security regulatory requirements and standards (such as PCI DSS, ISO 27001/2, CSC Critical Controls) </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Advanced knowledge and experience with the Windows and Linux operating systems </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Working knowledge of and experience in investigating malicious code and packet captures </SPAN> </LI> </UL> <P> </P> <P> <SPAN> <EM> Demonstrated ability to apply technical and analytical skills in a security environment </EM> </SPAN> </P> <UL> <LI> <SPAN> Ability to work extremely well under pressure while maintaining a professional image and approach </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Exceptional information analysis abilities; ability to perform independent analysis and distill relevant findings and root cause </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Strong analytical writing skills to articulate complex ideas clearly and effectively; experience creating and presenting documentation and management reports </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Team player with proven ability to work effectively with other business units, IT management and staff, vendors, and consultants </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Strong communication skills such as planning and leading effective meetings, conducting structured interviews to collect information, interpersonal and negotiation skills, and presenting to a variety of audiences </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Advanced skills to present information to stakeholders and/or decision makers in an effective and professional deliverable </SPAN> </LI> </UL> <P> </P> <P> <SPAN> <EM> Education/Certifications/Others </EM> </SPAN> </P> <P> <SPAN> Six or more years of technical experience in the information security field, preferably in this particular industry </SPAN> </P> <UL> <LI> <SPAN> Bachelor s degree in management information systems, computer science, or related discipline is required. </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Postgraduate degrees and certificate programs in relevant areas that demonstrate analytical writing will also be considered. </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> CISSP certified </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> SANS GCIH or GCFA, CISA, CISM, EnCER certification(s) preferred but not required. </SPAN> </LI> <LI> <SPAN> Must be able to work in afternoon shift and be on call during after-hours. </SPAN> </LI> </UL> </DIV> </DIV> </DIV>

Key Responsibilities<br><br>Ensure Security Incidents are raised and managed in line with Equiniti defined processes . <br><br>To escalate incidents and appropriately manage and record them . <br><br>Handling of security incidents raised by SOC provider . <br><br>Monitor external threat intelligence sources to assess the risk to Equiniti s infrastructure and services . <br><br>Ensure risks are maintained and managed inline with Equiniti s processes . <br><br>Proactively manage internal and external security services to identify threats to Equiniti infrastructure and services including Log Management ,  Manage Security Service alerts ,  vulnerability scanning ,  signature definition and reporting . <br><br>Conduct regular and ad-hoc vulnerability scans against our infrastructure to identify gaps and provide assurance (i . e .  that we ve patched specific exploits) . <br><br>Be a point of contact and escalation for the Managed Security Service provider .  Ensure appropriate responses ,  escalation and allocation of response .  Define thresholds and response processes . <br><br>To conduct and review information security audits of IT systems at group locations .  Identify incidents ,  weaknesses and areas for improvement and to articulate ,  document and communicate these ,  as required ,  through authorised channels .  <br><br>To analyse reports and respond to alerts from protective monitoring systems deployed in order to monitor the use of systems and services by users ,  to support incident response and investigation activities and thus ensure compliance is maintained and evidenced . <br><br>To track and manage identified vulnerabilities to ensure on-going visibility of issues through to mitigation ,  and to report on the status of identified vulnerabilities . <br><br>To support the ongoing capture and submission of information security management metrics to support the continual improvement of the ISMS and identification of incidents and weaknesses . <br><br>Should be willing to work UK US hours . Field Of Work : <br><br>Security Alert Incident Management<br><br>Monitor Security Threats<br><br>Manage proactive activities to mitigate security threats<br><br>Coordinating vulnerability scanning and testing activities with external partners<br><br>Liaise with Managed Security Services partner monitoring and respond to security events<br><br>Internal Information Security Audits<br><br>Protective Monitoring<br><br>Vulnerability Management<br><br>Information Security Metrics

html_job_description:
Senior Information Security Analyst - Pune, India

Are you looking to perform Risk assessment, identify and recommend security controls to internal information systems? Do you want to unleash your potential in a global Fintech company looking to move money for better? Join Western Union as a Senior Information Security Analyst.

Motivated by our values: purpose driven, globally minded, and trustworthy & respectful

We're a FinTech that's using insight from customers and colleagues worldwide to improve financial services for families, small businesses, multinational corporations, and non-profit organizations. We're a team of over 10,000 people spanning 200 countries and territories. We believe when money moves, better things happen.

Better requires process discipline and simplification

As a key member of the information security team, you will interact with management from various departments and business functions. You will be responsible to perform end to end Information Security Risk assessments independently with limited guidance and evaluating security controls as per well-known Industry-standard and framework such as ISO 27001, NIST, etc. With knowledge on how to perform Vulnerability Assessment of Web applications, Mobile Applications, Network, and Infrastructure assessments, you will help teams with devising Remediation plan by prioritizing the findings based on a Risk-based approach.





    For a critical role like this, you have invested 4-5 years of your life perfecting your skills within the information security risk assessment area. You should have experience in demonstrating knowledge of a broad range of Risk Assessment / Management Concepts: Auditing Methodologies and Approaches, Information Security Policies, Standards and Procedures, PCI Standards, ISO 2700x Standards, NIST Risk Framework, Legal, Regulatory, Compliance mandate and well versed with technology / security concepts such as Security Architecture and Design, Application Security, Network Security and Cryptography.





      Join us, and let's move money for better

      Western Union is transforming its business and shaping the financial services sector by driving quality, convenience, and customer service to new levels of excellence. It's an exciting time for our organization, as the largest cross-border money transfer operator, trusted by millions of consumers around the world. If you're ready to unleash your potential to help drive change through bottom-up innovation, apply now.

      We're a company on the move, and we want our people to grow and develop. You'll have plenty of opportunities to learn new skills and build a career, as well as a great salary and benefits package.

      Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and success. Western Union is proud to be an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer. The company will provide accommodation to applicants, including those with disabilities, during the recruitment process, in accordance with applicable laws. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy or related medical conditions), national origin, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, marital status, or any other protected category.

      #LI-AK1

job_description: <UL> <LI> The ideal candidate shall have extensive experience in building e2e usecases with resource constrained / tightly programmable accelerators . Experience in compute Vision and media analytics in any vertical is a definite plus </LI> <LI> The candidate should have interacted with customers/ customer facing teams with ample understanding of end customer requirements in the deep learning or computer vision areas . </LI> <LI> Self starter and go getter able to navigate thro nebulous / challenging problem areas and bring right technical solutions. </LI> </UL> <P> <STRONG> <U> Desired Skills: </U> </STRONG> </P> <UL> <LI> Fluent in C++ Programming </LI> <LI> Systems level understanding of media processing including streaming application (RTSP, RTCP, RTP etc), Familiarity with container formats </LI> <LI> Hands on experience with media software stack components (Media Drivers, Middleware such as GStreamer, FFMPEG etc) </LI> <LI> Should have working experience with video codecs such as H.264, HEVC, etc, and sound understanding of video codec specifications </LI> <LI> Working experience with Deep Learning frameworks would be a big plus (TensorFlow, Caffe, PyTorch etc) </LI> <LI> Agile mind-set, Ability to Multitask, with strong communication Skills would be feather in the cap </LI> </UL> <P> <STRONG> <U> Qualifications: </U> </STRONG> </P> <UL> <LI> Master /PhD in Computer Science from a premier institute </LI> <LI> 15+ years of relevant Experience </LI> </UL><br><br><P>    </ P>

<b> Requirements:</b> <div> <b> <br> </b> </div> <div> <p> We are looking for applicants with a strong background in Analytics and Data mining (Web, Social and Big data), Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition, Natural Language Processing and Computational Linguistics, Statistical Modelling and Inferencing, Information Retrieval, Large Scale Distributed Systems and Cloud Computing, Econometrics and Quantitative Marketing, Applied Game Theory and Mechanism Design, Operations Research and Optimization, Human Computer Interaction and Information Visualization. Applicants with a background in other quantitative areas are also encouraged to apply.</p> <p> <br> </p> <p> <strong> We are looking for someone who can create and implement AI solutions. If you have built a product like IBM WATSON in the past and not just used WATSON to build applications, this could be the perfect role for you.</strong> </p> <p> <strong> <br> </strong> </p> <p> All successful candidates are expected to dive deep into problem areas of Zycus' interest and invent technology solutions to not only advance the current products, but also to generate new product options that can strategically advantage the organization.</p> <p> <br> </p> <p> <strong> Skills:</strong> </p> <ul> <li> Experience in predictive modelling and predictive software development</li> <li> Skilled in Java, C++, Perl/Python (or similar scripting language)</li> <li> Experience in using R, Matlab, or any other statistical software</li> <li> Experience in mentoring junior team members, and guiding them on machine learning and data modelling applications</li> <li> Strong communication and data presentation skills</li> <li> Classification (svm, decision tree, random forest, neural network)</li> <li> Regression (linear, polynomial, logistic, etc)</li> <li> Classical Optimization(gradient descent, newton raphson, etc)</li> <li> Graph theory (network analytics)</li> <li> Heuristic optimisation (genetic algorithm, swarm theory)</li> <li> Deep learning (lstm, convolutional nn, recurrent nn)</li> </ul> <p> <strong> Must Have:</strong> </p> <ul> <li> Experience: 3-9 years</li> <li> The ideal candidate must have proven expertise in <strong> Artificial Intelligence</strong> (including deep learning algorithms),<strong> Machine Learning and/or NLP</strong> </li> <li> The candidate must also have expertise in programming traditional machine learning algorithms, algorithm design & usage</li> <li> Preferred experience with large data sets & distributed computing in Hadoop ecosystem</li> <li> Fluency with databases</li> </ul> <b> </b> </div>

html_job_description:
About Standard Chartered 
We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East.

To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.

We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.

The Role Responsibilities
  • Should be able to create solutions and try various algorithms to solve the problem.
  • Use NLP,Vision and ML techniques to bring order to unstructured data
  • Experience in extracting signal from noise in large unstructured datasets a plus
  • Work within the Engineering Team to design, code, train, test, deploy and iterate on enterprise scale machine learning systems
  • Work alongside an excellent, cross-functional team across Engineering, Product and Design
Our Ideal Candidate
  • Experience in applying machine learning techniques, Natural Language Processing or Computer Vision using TensorFlow, Pytorch
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Solid software engineering skills across multiple languages including but not limited to Java or Python, C/C++
  • Problem solver - able to work independently, and be comfortable with deadlines and milestones
  • Deep understanding of ML techniques such as: classification, clustering, deep learning, optimization methods, supervised and unsupervised techniques
  • Strong communication skills and an easy going attitude
  • Proven ability to apply, debug, and develop machine learning models for real-world applications
  • Previous industry work experience required
,
